statements: SELECT * FROM criminals;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 1;
SELECT criminal_record FROM criminals WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM criminals ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM criminals WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT criminal_id, first_name, last_name FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT criminal_id, first_name, last_name FROM criminals ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_criminals FROM criminals;
SELECT * FROM criminals
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM criminals WHERE gender = 'M'
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Murder' ORDER BY crime_date DESC
SELECT alias, height, nationality FROM criminals WHERE age > 30 AND nationality = 'USA'
SELECT criminal_id, COUNT(*) AS num_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY criminal_id HAVING num_crimes > 1
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, age, height FROM criminals WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT alias, gender, height FROM criminals WHERE nationality = 'UK' AND height > 170 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM criminals WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY crime_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM known_criminals;
SELECT name, alias FROM known_criminals WHERE alias IS NOT NULL;
SELECT criminal_id, name, description FROM known_criminals ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date, location FROM criminal_records WHERE crime_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id FROM security_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN';
SELECT * FROM known_criminals;
SELECT name, alias FROM known_criminals WHERE criminal_id = 1;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date, location FROM criminal_records WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id FROM security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, alias, description FROM known_criminals WHERE description LIKE '%notorious%';
SELECT * FROM criminals;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM criminals WHERE age > 25;
SELECT crime_name, crime_date FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_date ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM criminals WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM criminal_photos WHERE criminal_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM criminals;
SELECT crime_name, crime_description, crime_date FROM crimes;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM criminals ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT criminal_id, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM criminals_crimes GROUP BY criminal_id HAVING total_crimes > 1;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.photo_url FROM criminals c JOIN criminal_photos p ON c.criminal_id = p.criminal_id;
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM criminals WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT criminal_id, height, weight FROM criminals ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Murder' AND crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT alias_name, criminal_id FROM aliases WHERE alias_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE height > 180;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM criminals WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT criminal_id, COUNT(*) FROM crimes GROUP BY criminal_id;
SELECT * FROM criminals ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sightings WHERE location = 'New York' AND sighting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
